prompt.content:
Please generate the first 10 instances of XNLI Swahili dataset train split. Use the following format:
id | premise | hypothesis | label
---|---------|------------|------
1 | {premise1} | {hypothesis1} | {label1}
2 | {premise2} | {hypothesis2} | {label2}
...
. You should map the labels based on the following rules:
0 for entailement, 1 for neutral, 2 for contradiction

response:
1 | Mtu huyo anapiga picha. | Mtu huyo anatumia kamera. | 0
2 | Watoto wawili wanacheza video. | Watoto wawili wanacheza nje. | 2
3 | Mwanamke anapika chakula. | Mwanamke anapika chakula cha jioni. | 1
4 | Mwanafunzi anasoma kitabu. | Mwanafunzi anasoma gazeti. | 2
5 | Wafanyakazi wanafanya kazi ofisini. | Wafanyakazi wanafanya kazi nyumbani. | 2
6 | Mwanamke anaimba wimbo. | Mwanamke anasikiliza wimbo. | 2
7 | Mtu anatembea mbwa wake. | Mtu anatembea paka wake. | 2
8 | Watu wanaogelea kwenye bwawa. | Watu wanaogelea kwenye bahari. | 2
9 | Mchezaji wa mpira wa miguu anapiga mpira. | Mchezaji wa mpira wa miguu anashika mpira. | 2
10 | Mvulana anacheza na kifaru cha plastiki. | Mvulana anacheza na ndege ya plastiki. | 2

prompt.content:
Please generate the first 10 instances of XNLI Swahili dataset validation split. Use the following format:
id | premise | hypothesis | label
---|---------|------------|------
1 | {premise1} | {hypothesis1} | {label1}
2 | {premise2} | {hypothesis2} | {label2}
...
. You should map the labels based on the following rules:
0 for entailement, 1 for neutral, 2 for contradiction

response:
1 | Mtu huyo anapiga picha. | Mtu huyo anapiga picha kwa kutumia kamera. | 1
2 | Mwanamke anafungua tunda. | Mwanamke anafungua tunda ili kula. | 1
3 | Watu wawili wanasimama karibu na gari. | Watu wawili wanasimama karibu na gari ili kuingia ndani. | 1
4 | Mwanamke anapika chakula. | Mwanamke anapika chakula kwa ajili ya familia yake. | 1
5 | Watoto wanacheza mpira wa miguu. | Watoto wanacheza mpira wa miguu shuleni. | 1
6 | Mwanamume anasoma gazeti. | Mwanamume anasoma gazeti ili kujua habari za siku. | 1
7 | Mwanamke anafanya mazoezi. | Mwanamke anafanya mazoezi ili kuimarisha afya yake. | 1
8 | Mtu anapanda mti. | Mtu anapanda mti ili kuboresha mazingira. | 1
9 | Watu wanaogelea kwenye bwawa. | Watu wanaogelea kwenye bwawa ili kujifunza kuogelea. | 1
10 | Mwanafunzi anasoma kitabu. | Mwanafunzi anasoma kitabu ili kujifunza somo. | 1

prompt.content:
Please generate the first 10 instances of XNLI Swahili dataset test split. Use the following format:
id | premise | hypothesis | label
---|---------|------------|------
1 | {premise1} | {hypothesis1} | {label1}
2 | {premise2} | {hypothesis2} | {label2}
...
. You should map the labels based on the following rules:
0 for entailement, 1 for neutral, 2 for contradiction

response:
1 | Mwanamke mmoja anapiga picha. | Mwanamke anatumia kamera. | 0
2 | Kikundi cha watu kinaimba na kucheza. | Watu wanakula chakula. | 2
3 | Mtu mmoja anasoma gazeti. | Mtu huyo anasoma kitabu. | 1
4 | Watoto wawili wanacheza mpira wa miguu. | Watoto wanacheza mpira wa kikapu. | 2
5 | Mtu anapika chakula jikoni. | Mtu anafanya usafi jikoni. | 1

8 | Watu wawili wanapanda mlima. | Watu wanashuka mlima. | 1
9 | Mtu anapanda baiskeli. | Mtu anatembea kwa miguu. | 2
